commands.name: az networkcloud l2network create
commands.summary: Create a new layer 2 (L2) network or update the properties of the existing network.
commands.syntax:
az networkcloud l2network create --extended-location
                                 --l2-isolation-domain-id
                                 --l2-network-name
                                 --resource-group
                                 [--interface-name]
                                 [--location]
                                 [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                 [--tags]
examples: az networkcloud l2network create --name "l2NetworkName" --extended-location name="/subscriptions/subscriptionId/resourceGroups/resourceGroupName/providers/Microsoft.ExtendedLocation/customLocations/clusterExtendedLocationName" type="CustomLocation" --location "location" --interface-name "eth0" --l2-isolation-domain-id "/subscriptions/subscriptionId/resourceGroups/resourceGroupName/providers/Microsoft.ManagedNetworkFabric/l2IsolationDomains/l2IsolationDomainName" --tags key1="myvalue1" key2="myvalue2" --resource-group "resourceGroupName"

commands.name: az networkcloud l2network delete
commands.syntax:
az networkcloud l2network delete [--ids]
                                 [--l2-network-name]
                                 [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                 [--resource-group]
                                 [--subscription]
                                 [--yes]

commands.name: az networkcloud l2network list
commands.summary: List layer 2 (L2) networks in the provided resource group or subscription.

commands.name: az networkcloud l2network show
commands.summary: Get properties of the provided layer 2 (L2) network.

commands.name: az networkcloud l2network update
commands.summary: Update tags associated with the provided layer 2 (L2) network.
examples: az networkcloud l2network update --name "l2NetworkName" --tags key1="myvalue1" key2="myvalue2" --resource-group "resourceGroupName"

commands.name: az networkcloud l2network wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
